bibliography:
Alston, William P., 1961, “Tillich’s Conception of a

Press, 1965.

Press.

Hartshorne, Charles, 1948, The Divine Relativity, New

Hill, David J., 2005, Divinity and Maximal Greatness,

Hoffman, Joshua and Gary S. Rosenkrantz, 2002, The Divine

Hügel, Friedrich von, 1930, Essays and Addresses on the

Lott, Eric J., 1980, Vedantic Approaches to God, London:

Mill, John Stuart, 1874, Theism, New York: Liberal Arts

Morris, Thomas V., 1984, “The God of Abraham, Isaac, and

–––, 1991, “Defining the Divine,” in

–––, first half of 12th century, The Vedanta
